body:
I don't understand this mindset. You want to censor the frontpage, because the content could potentially hurt the feelings of new users? 

I doubt it. I am not particularly interested in Nazi stuff or anything. Although I am a race realist admittedly, and I do post comments, when I know the answers, but I don't really care about the ideology of a person here or groups here. I created my own little guild, in which I post stuff (it's mostly me and only a handful of other users, since I think most people don't really know that much about human biological diversity), but it's interesting enough.  
I was not turned off by anything.

body:
Reddit was best between the coontown ban and 2015, there was free speech for the most part, Democrats were more concerned about astroturfing news comments and ignored Reddit, but the stormfronters who were literally there to spread propaganda were gone. I don't want 'free speech' to mean everything that exists outside of mainstream liberal PC approved content. I want a community where there's actually free speech, but attracts a diverse crowd that isn't hyperpartisan morons with no lives. That's the problem with any major 'free speech' platform, because there's actually people content with modern Reddit and Twitter who won't leave.

I find this place better than voat, every 'free speech' exodus has become milder and milder to the point where I actually want to participate.

I want a community where there's actually free speech, but attracts a diverse crowd that isn't hyperpartisan morons with no lives. That's the problem with any major 'free speech' platform, because there's actually people content with modern Reddit and Twitter who won't leave.

I find this place better than voat, every 'free speech' exodus has become milder and milder to the point where I actually want to participate.

post.title: New users see the following screen after registering: “Welcome to Ruqqus! These guilds are currently trending. Join some to start customizing your home page.”

body:
First, what format is it in? Pix or link? If it's pix, upload to [catbox.moe](https://catbox.moe) or https://imgbb.com. 

- Click the leaf at the top of the page after uploading, make sure it's a direct image link. It should look like this: **https://files.catbox.moe/m041kt.jpg** in the url bar. Then select a title that sums it up and catches attention. (Acting surprised tends to get attention, which even I am often surprised at new facts).

- Click post, the guild should be +general, (if there's nothing filled in it will default to general). 

- Check your notifications, if it's yanked just go to the post and click "Remove from [guild]" 

- To post an embedded image in the comments, (I often am challenged on my posts and have to defend them with supporting facts) type ! [ ] ( picturelink.jpg ) with no spaces. You'll get the hang of it. 

If you want to practice in +HitlerWasRight you can, but I always started with general. (A lot of people block jew/nazi based guilds, so they'll see it in +general).
